message.name: ERR_SERPLAN_CONTRACT_RV_SERPLAN_MUST_BE_ACTIVE_OR_APPROVED
message.locale: Service plan status must be Active or Approved.

message.name: ERR_SERPLAN_MODIFY_CONTRACT_RV_SERPLAN_MUST_NOT_BE_CLOSED
message.locale: The contract may not be modified as the service plan has already been closed.

message.name: ERR_SERPLAN_CREATE_CONTRACT_RV_SERPLAN_MUST_NOT_BE_CLOSED
message.locale: The contract may not be created as the service plan has already been closed.

message.name: ERR_SERPLAN_CONTRACT_XRV_PLANITEMS_STILL_REQUIRE_APPROVAL
message.locale: A contract may not be issued for this service plan as there are plan items present on the service plan that require approval.

message.name: ERR_SERPLAN_CONTRACT_RV_INSERT_CONTRACT_ISSUED_ALREADY_EXIST_NOT_RETURNED
message.locale: A new contract may not be issued for this service plan as an existing contract has already been issued and not yet returned.

message.name: ERR_SERPLAN_CONTRACT_RV_MODIFY_CONTRACT_ISSUED_ALREADY_EXIST_NOT_RETURNED
message.locale: The changes you have made cannot be saved as they will result in contract status returning to Issued and there is already a contract with this status.

message.name: ERR_SERPLAN_CONTRACT_RV_INSERT_CONTRACT_MULTI_CONRACT_NOT_ALLOWED
message.locale: A new contract may not be issued for this service plan as a contract has already been issued.

message.name: ERR_SERPLAN_CONTRACT_RV_MODIFY_CONTRACT_MULTI_CONRACT_NOT_ALLOWED
message.locale: Your changes cannot be saved as there has already been a contract issued in respect of this service plan.

message.name: ERR_SERPLAN_CONTRACT_FV_DUPLICATE_DATES_ENTERED
message.locale: Only one of the fields, Date Accepted, Date Rejected and Date Cancelled may be specified.
Only one of the fields, Date Accepted, Date Rejected and Date Canceled may be specified.

message.name: ERR_SERPLAN_CONTRACT_FV_CANCELDATE_ENTERED_ISSUE_DATE_EMPTY
message.locale: You must enter an Issue Date before a Date Cancelled can be specified.
You must enter an Issue Date before a Date Canceled can be specified.

message.name: ERR_SERPLAN_CONTRACT_FV_REJECTDATE_ENTERED_ISSUE_DATE_EMPTY
message.locale: You must enter an Issue Date before a Date Rejected can be specified.

message.name: ERR_SERPLAN_CONTRACT_FV_ACCEPTDATE_ENTERED_ISSUE_DATE_EMPTY
message.locale: You must enter an Issue Date before a Date Accepted can be specified.

message.name: ERR_SERPLAN_CONTRACT_XFV_CANCELDATE_EARLIER_THAN_ISSUEDATE
message.locale: The Date Cancelled cannot be earlier than the Issue Date.
The Date Canceled cannot be earlier than the Issue Date.

message.name: ERR_SERPLAN_CONTRACT_XFV_CANCELDATE_AFTER_TODAYS_DATE
message.locale: The Date Cancelled cannot be any later than today.
The Date Canceled cannot be any later than today.

message.name: ERR_SERPLAN_CONTRACT_FV_DATE_ENTERED_CANCEL_REASON_EMPTY
message.locale: You must enter a Cancellation Reason if a Date Cancelled has been specified.
You must enter a Cancellation Reason if a Date Canceled has been specified.

message.name: ERR_SERPLAN_CONTRACT_XFV_REJECTDATE_EARLIER_THAN_ISSUEDATE
message.locale: The Date Rejected cannot be earlier than the Issue Date.

message.name: ERR_SERPLAN_CONTRACT_XFV_ACCEPTDATE_EARLIER_THAN_ISSUEDATE
message.locale: The Date Accepted cannot be earlier than the Issue Date.

message.name: ERR_SERPLAN_CONTRACT_XFV_REJECEDDATE_AFTER_TODAYS_DATE
message.locale: The Date Rejected cannot be any later than today.

message.name: ERR_SERPLAN_CONTRACT_XFV_ACCEPTDATE_AFTER_TODAYS_DATE
message.locale: The Date Accepted cannot be any later than today.

message.name: ERR_SERPLAN_CONTRACT_FV_DATE_ENTERED_REJECT_REASON_EMPTY
message.locale: You must enter a Reject Reason if a Date Rejected has been specified.

message.name: ERR_SERPLAN_CONTRACT_XFV_DATEACCEPTED_ENTERED_CANCEL_REJECTED_INFO_ALSO_ENTERED
message.locale: You have entered a value in the Date Accepted field thus indicating that the contract has been accepted. Therefore you cannot enter any information in either the Rejection or Cancellation sections.
You have entered a value in the Date Accepted field thus indicating that the contract has been accepted. Therefore you cannot enter any information in either the Rejection or Cancellation sections.

message.name: ERR_SERPLAN_CONTRACT_FV_COMMENTSORREASON_ENTERED_CANCEL_DATE_EMPTY
message.locale: You must enter a Date Cancelled if a Cancellation Reason or Comments have been specified.
You must enter a Date Canceled if a Cancellation Reason or Comments have been specified.

message.name: ERR_SERPLAN_CONTRACT_FV_COMMENTSORREASON_ENTERED_REJECT_DATE_EMPTY
message.locale: You must enter a Date Rejected if a Reject Reason or Comments have been specified.

message.name: ERR_SERPLAN_CONTRACT_XFV_ISSUEDATE_TODAY
message.locale: The Issue Date cannot be any earlier than today.

message.name: ERR_SERPLAN_CONTRACT_FV_ADDRESS_EMPTY
message.locale: The contract address must be specified.

message.name: ERR_SERPLAN_CONTRACT_FV_CREATE_REASON_EMPTY
message.locale: The reason for creating the contract must be specified.

message.name: ERR_SERPLAN_CONTRACT_FV_CLIENT_EMPTY
message.locale: The client to whom the contract is issued to must be specified.

message.name: ERR_LIST_SECURITY_CHECK_FAILED
message.locale: You do not have the appropriate privileges to view this page.

message.name: ERR_LIST_PARTICIPANT_SENSITIVITY_CHECK_FAILED
message.locale: You do not have the appropriate privileges to list contracts for this service plan.

message.name: ERR_ISSUE_CONTRACT_PARTICIPANTS_SECURITY_CHECK_FAILED
message.locale: You do not have the appropriate privileges to view this page.

message.name: ERR_ISSUE_CONTRACT_PARTICIPANTS_PARTICIPANT_SENSITIVITY_CHECK_FAILED
message.locale: You do not have the appropriate privileges to view this page.

message.name: ERR_CREATE_CONTRACT_SECURITY_CHECK_FAILED
message.locale: You do not have the appropriate privileges to create a contract for this service plan.

message.name: ERR_VIEW_CONTRACT_SECURITY_CHECK_FAILED
message.locale: You do not have the appropriate privileges to view this page.

message.name: ERR_VIEW_CONTRACT_PARTICIPANT_SENSITIVITY_CHECK_FAILED
message.locale: You do not have the appropriate privileges to view this page.

message.name: ERR_PRINT_CONTRACT_HISTORY_SECURITY_CHECK_FAILED
message.locale: You do not have the appropriate privileges to view this page.

message.name: ERR_PRINT_CONTRACT_HISTORY_PARTICIPANT_SENSITIVITY_CHECK_FAILED
message.locale: You do not have the appropriate privileges to view this page.

message.name: ERR_MODIFY_CONTRACT_SECURITY_CHECK_FAILED
message.locale: You do not have the appropriate privileges to modify this contract.

message.name: ERR_MODIFY_CONTRACT_PARTICIPANT_SENSITIVITY_CHECK_FAILED
message.locale: You do not have the appropriate privileges to modify this contract.

message.name: ERR_SERPLAN_CONTRACT_FV_ISSUE_DATE_EMPTY
message.locale: The issue date must be entered

message.name: ERR_SERPLAN_CONTRACT_FV_CLIENT_NAME_EMPTY
message.locale: A client name must be selected

message.name: ERR_PREVIEW_CONTRACT_SECURITY_CHECK_FAILED
message.locale: You do not have the appropriate privileges to preview the contract for this service plan.

message.name: ERR_PRINT_CONTRACT_SECURITY_CHECK_FAILED
message.locale: You do not have the appropriate privileges to print the contract for this service plan.

message.name: ERR_PRINT_CONTRACT_PARTICIPANT_SENSITIVITY_CHECK_FAILED
message.locale: You do not have the appropriate privileges to print the contract for this service plan.

message.name: ERR_SERPLAN_CONTRACT_FV_ISSUEDATE_ENTERED_BEFORE_CONTRACT_CREATION_DATE
message.locale: The issue date must not be earlier than the contract creation date

message.name: ERR_SERPLAN_CONTRACT_FV__MODIFY_ISSUED_CONRTACT_ALREADY_EXISTS
message.locale: Acceptance, Rejection or Cancellation details cannot be removed because a contract with a status of issued already exists.

message.name: ERR_PRINT_CONTRACT_VIEW
message.locale: An un-handled server exception has occurred. Please contact your administrator.

message.name: INF_SERPLAN_CONTRACT_XRV_SERPLAN_MUST_BE_ACTIVE_OR_APPROVED
message.locale: Service Plan contracts cannot be created for this Service Plan as its status is not 'Active' or 'Approved'.
